SELECT c_gateway.gateway_code, c_gateway_attr1.`name`, c_gateway_attr1.location, c_gateway_attr1.lamp_pole_num, c_gateway_attr1.`comment` acomment, c_gateway_upload_status.voltage, b_gateway_fault.tdate, b_gateway_fault.`comment` fcomment FROM b_gateway_fault LEFT JOIN c_gateway ON c_gateway.id = b_gateway_fault.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 ON c_gateway_attr1.c_gateway_id = b_gateway_fault.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_upload_status ON c_gateway_upload_status.c_gateway_id = b_gateway_fault.c_gateway_id WHERE 1=1 AND c_gateway_attr1.sys_user_id = #{pd.sys_user_id}
and ( c_gateway_attr1.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}),'%') )
and ( c_gateway.gateway_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.gateway_code}),'%') )
and ( c_gateway_attr1.location LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.location}),'%') )
and ( b_gateway_fault.`status` = #{pd.lstatus} )
GROUP BY c_gateway.id

SELECT c_term.`name` tname, c_client.client_code ccode, c_client_attr1.`name` cname, c_client_attr1.location, c_client_attr1.lamp_pole_num, c_gateway_attr1.`name` gname, b_status.`name` lstatus, b_client_fault.tdate, b_client_fault.`comment`
FROM b_client_fault LEFT JOIN c_client ON c_client.id = b_client_fault.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 ON c_client_attr1.c_client_id = b_client_fault.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 ON c_gateway_attr1.c_gateway_id IN ( SELECT c_client_gateway.c_gateway_id FROM c_client_gateway WHERE c_client_gateway.c_client_id = b_client_fault.c_client_id ) LEFT JOIN c_term ON c_term.id = ( SELECT c_client_term.c_term_id FROM c_client_term WHERE c_client_term.c_client_id = b_client_fault.c_client_id ) LEFT JOIN b_status ON b_status_main_id = 4 AND b_status.`value` = b_client_fault.`status` WHERE 1=1 AND c_gateway_attr1.sys_user_id = #{pd.sys_user_id}
and ( c_term.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.tname}),'%') )
and ( c_client_attr1.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.cname}),'%') )
and ( c_client.client_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.ccode}),'%') )
and ( c_client_attr1.location LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.location}),'%') )
and ( b_client_fault.`status` = #{pd.lstatus} )
GROUP BY b_client_fault.id

SELECT * FROM v_vofaults WHERE 1=1 AND v_vofaults.sys_user_id = #{pd.sys_user_id}
and ( v_vofaults.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}),'%') )
and ( v_vofaults.code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.code}),'%') )
and ( v_vofaults.location LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.location}),'%') )
GROUP BY v_vofaults.tdate
